NewsEntry.text:
<color=yellow>★ Christmas Discount ★</color>
★ All of the Donation Options will be on 20% Discount until New Years' ★

<color=yellow>Meredian Christmas Building Event Winners</color>
Our most sincere gratitute for joining us and showcasing your impressive building works The leaderboard as follows:
1) Xiamara 2) JLD 3) Kira79 4) SilentShino 5) Mgrace

<color=yellow>Update 4.30.0 Manual Update Download
You can click banner to download the update directly ★</color>

<color=yellow>Update 4.30.0
For the last month of 2024, we've prepared a bigger update for our Meredian Family, offering more variety and performance than before at the same time. We're also including new wears that have been created from our new designers, all being a part of the Meredian Community,
Thank you for being a part of Meredian and making it a wonderful place We are wishing you all a Happy New Year ★</color> • Content • Tattoos • Over 100 new styles and new variations of Tattoos and Face Tattoos, have been added to the game • Over 200 older Tattoos and Face Tattoos have been remastered and increased in visual detail and color • Other • Several new pieces of wear for female have been added to the game
• Features: • Favorite Expressions feature has been implemented • Players now will be able to Shift+Left Click on their favorite Expressions to save them to Favorites Category
• Fixes and Improvements • All of the Tattoos and Tattoo variations, as well as Prints have been reworked to pack better visuals as well as increasing performance while reducing the overall disk size • Previous bug that prevented from changing Chat Settings has been fixed • Certain fixes has been made to Profile Editor to prevent profiles from getting broken • Incoming notifications being stuck on Character Select and Log Out screens has been fixed • Refreshing profile on gifting photo slots bug has been fixed • Some performance tweaks have been applied to Snow Effect in World Editor
Disclaimer: We've made big steps in improvement in this update, while trying our best to ensure there were no mistakes, There might be few elements that we didn't notice due to the vast amount of the changes, We will keep monitoring the update for potential follow-up fixes ★
<color=yellow>Official Meredian Christmas Party</color> ★ You are all invited ★

<color=yellow>Christmas Building Contest</color> • The Build must be original (no downloaded content) • The Deadline date is 20.12.2024 • For questions related to the event: • Contact [MOD]Belle-Ripley or [MOD]Shanks in-game, or • Cinderbelleqc or Luminoushank via Discord
<color=yellow>♠ Casino Interior Update ♠</color> Everyone is welcome to join Casino Party, may the luck be with you ★

<color=yellow>Update 4.29.0</color> • Improvements: • An alternative way to connect to the game has been added (Primary/Secondary options in Login Screen) • Strapon and Slowdance sub-menus are made more compact • Animations: • Few new expressions have been added • A new animation has been added to slowdance mode • Fixes: • Connection Error on Login Screen not showing up issue has been fixed • Gift Preview Panel not resetting on re-opening has been fixed • Closing rooms through UI(Room List Menu) issues have been fixed • Moan related bugs on Pole poses have been fixed • Players seeing some of the dancing avatars as idling bug has been fixed
• Currently, the chat settings are bugged, it's not advised to change them, they will be fixed in the follow-up update

<color=yellow>Christmas Building Contest</color> • The Build must be original (no downloaded content) • The Deadline date is 20.12.2024 • For questions related to the event: • Contact [MOD]Belle-Ripley or [MOD]Shanks in-game, or • Cinderbelleqc or Luminoushank via Discord
<color=yellow>Update 4.28.0</color> • Various client and server changes have been made for improvements on the gameplay experience

<color=yellow>Meredian Halloween Event</color> The spookiest day of the year is coming, and as it couldn't be missed, we're going to have an EVENT, and we're counting on your presence! Will it be a trick-or-treat day for you? Put on your best Halloween costume and let's celebrate!

<color=yellow>Update 4.27.0</color> • Implemented various operators for YouTube for enhanced Video Quality in TV • Different operator options may also help fixing TV related issues • It's advised to switch and test them to find the one to your liking • Operator settings are individual, meaning you can still enjoy your choice of operator while the TV host is broadcasting from a different operator • While the operator choice are individual and independent, newly selected operator will activate on the next unique video if it was changed during an ongoing video • Changing operator does not require a game restart • The implementation may also give light to the future projects to enhance the overall quality and entertainment of TV
• Added a Lovense Mode Function to mitigate issues related to not reaching devices even after connection is established, see /l-help for more information
• Implemented Gift Preview Mode • Players now will be able to preview the gifts that they have been creating by clicking on "Preivew" on Gift Sending menu to view how the gift will look after being sent
• Ambient Sound slider in Settings now affect the machine sounds in Casino Room
• Implemented a warning screen that puts 2-Step verification on Unfriending, Ignoring and Gifting Photo Slot to ensure they are not used accidentally
<color=yellow>Maintenance</color> Server is currently unstable, we are investigating the cause, during this time the game may behave inconsistently, thank you for your understanding
<color=yellow>Discord</color> We are aware about Russia and Turkey blocking Discord, we are working for a solution. For now please use VPN if you can't access discord
<color=yellow>Whitelist</color> Having problems logging in? Please remember to whitelist yourself from our Discord server
<color=yellow>Update 4.26.1</color> • YouTube links not working in TV issue has been fixed

<color=yellow>Meredian Stripper Contest Event</color> • 20 Applications (Limited Time) • Pick a Song + Outfit and perform for the jury and the crowd • Contact Trade-pearl or [MOD]Belle-Ripley from in-game, or tradelaw and cinderbelleqc from Discord • Applications until 02/10/2024

<color=yellow>Update 4.26.0</color> • Animations: • 19 more poses have been added • Features: • Added a sync dance button to the dances panel • SYN button can be used to sync dances with your partners and/or group members • Remove /syncdance command • Implemented cumshots to persist on all of the female body parts at the same time • Gifts list will display the name of the senders colors corresponding to their avatar types • Fixes: • Fix occasional issue causing gifting photo slot to other player but current one • Fixed the sex mode UI dropdown not resetting to default on logout • Fixed the bask expression for females • Fixed the initial cumshot color

<color=yellow>Update 4.25.0</color> • Content • 115 new poses have been added to the game
• Features • Character Editor • Alt+Click on items will open their customization window without unequipping them • A better color selection tool has been added to Shape & Colors category
• Fixes • Poses without icons issue have been fixed • Various coloring bugs in Character Editor have been fixed • Friend list duplication bug have been fixed
<color=yellow>Meredian Gold Rush Event</color>
<color=yellow>Update 4.24.0 Content</color> • Some of the animations (Dances and Actions) have been optimized

<color=yellow>Update 4.24.0</color> • Optimization: • Various optimizations made to clothes and settings • Eliminated the performance issue during and upon opening the Room List • Various optimizations and performance tweaks have been made for in-game Worlds (player rooms) • Features: • New loading system for in-game items for overall performance increase • The system will take place the first time game is launched, don't close the game • Implement persistent expressions on room change • Players will keep their last active expressions on room changing • Fixes: • Fixes on the server stability • Various fixes made to the updater • Fixes applied on the UI elements that caused performance issues prior • /afk Mode resulting in spam in DM's has been fixed • Night Club (Default Location) Sink furniture unintentionally undressing clothes on use has been fixed • Fix character editor issues: • Clothes that were not being removed properly on some of the old avatar files has been fixed • Wrong display of settings on stockings category inside of the Wardrobe has been fixed • Adjustments on Wardrobe clothes sliders has been applied • meredian.in website • Change Password and Change E-mail features have been fixed • Fixes on VR mode issues: • Fix on the virtual keyboard on pressing "V" • Fixes on nicknames displaying
<color=pink>Lovense</color>

<color=yellow>Update 4.23.0</color> • Content • New Content • 30 Female Glasses • 29 Male Glasses • 4 Female Topwear • 3 Male Topwear • 4 Female Dress • 4 Female Botwear • 4 Female Shoe Pairs • 3 Female Bra • 1 Female Underwear • 1 Female Headwear • 2 Female Masks (2 Remakes & Improvements) • 3 Male Masks (2 Remakes & Improvements) • 4 Female Outfit Items • 1 Female Backpack • 1 Male Backpack • 2 Female Rings • 2 Male Rings • Roughly 250 Prints • Fixes • 17 wears have been remade • Two masks in the glasses category have moved to masks • Over 150 outdated and poorly working prints have been replaced with new ones • Optimization: • Various optimizations have been made • Features: • Lovesense support implemented to the game, you may use /l-help for instructions • Worn clothes in the Character Editor will be highlighted for ease of use for the players • x2.5 and x3.0 options for UI Scaling have been added to the Settings • The Sliders feature for advanced customization for wears have been implemented for glasses • Fixes: • The bug causing translation function to stop/freeze has been fixed • Mixed 2 animations for FF on Sofa for giver and receiver have been corrected • Bugged face expressions upon using Moan on some few poses have been fixed • Still having a partner after being removed from 3-Partner instance has been fixed • Sometimes automatic undressing not working in sex poses bug has been fixed • World Editor exclusive use property icon bug has been fixed

<color=yellow>We are sorry to inform that due to technical issues, we had to postpone the Messy Creepy Run event to a later date, 22.06.2024 20:00 UTC During this one week period delay, we will do our best to polish the event and try our best to prevent any inconveniences from happening again, as well as increasing the reward pool as a compensation. Thank you for your understanding ☆</color>
<color=yellow>☆ Building Contest with Color Name Rewards ✎ Contact tradelaw in Discord for more information ⇩ Click the picture below to download the sample World file and rules ⇩</color>

<color=yellow>Update 4.22.0</color> • Features: • Smooth Crossfading has been implemented to Expressions • Slider support for advanced customization has been added to secondary color materials of wearables • Fixes: • Camera panning offset not resetting on camera mode change has been fixed • World Editor exclusive Xgold icon bug has been fixed • Flying vehicles rotating in an unintended way has been fixed • Some pose tab names have been corrected • Strapon-lock bug that was happening during anal poses has been fixed • Character parameters precision has been set to 0.000 from 0.00 • Caps with custom prints not displaying in rooms bug has been fixed • Fixes on several more camera related bugs on some poses
<color=yellow>Alternative Link For Update </color>

<color=yellow>Update 4.21.0</color> • Feature • Camera Panning has been implemented to the normal gameplay • Now players will be able to pan their third person camera by clicking and holding down their Mouse Scroll Wheel while moving it above & below • The position of the panning resets to default by either switching camera mode or joining to a room for ease of use • Optimization • Various performance improvements made to playable character components • Vehicles to be used in events have been remade to satisfy an overall better performance throughout the game • Fixes • Poses • Some poses have been moved to to more appropriate tabs • Incorrect cumshots on some positions have been fixed • Incorrect camera positions have been fixed • A bug causing the strap-on panel to disappear has been fixed
<color=yellow>Alternative Link For Update </color>

<color=yellow>Update 4.20.2</color> • Adjustments on clickable walking area • Players are now able to click and move minimal distances again • Fix on the bug that prevented avatars' mobility from moving inside of the World Editor • Various fixes on the updater
<color=yellow>Alternative Link For Update </color>

<color=yellow>13.04.2024 Meredian Boat Race Event</color>
• Boat Race Event Party • Prizes for the top 5 X-Gold and colored names. • Live DJ's during the event. • Games and riddles during the evening for the spectators.

<color=yellow>Update 4.20.1</color>
- Profile: - Favorite Friends feature has been implemented - Using ☆ on a friend's profile will put them above in the friend list - Favorite Friends is a client feature just like Favorite Rooms, meaning the server cannot view it and Favorite Friends remains as the player's privacy - A profile navigation button has been added - You can revisit the previously seen profiles by clicking on the back button in the beginning of the nickname field of profiles - Report button now forwards to the Official Meredian Discord's ticket support channel - Ignore list is now using sorting method by alphabet - Ignores added during current session will be unsorted on the bottom of the list until the next log in - Cumshot: - Added Cumshot & Squirt effect for ~50 Threesome Poses - Fixes on sending cumshot targets to other players - Add experimental setting to fix animation de-synchronization (it's disabled by default) - You can find this setting in Game Tab in Settings Menu
<color=yellow>Alternative Link For Update </color>

<color=yellow>13.04.2024 Meredian Boat Race Event</color>
• 32 free places (first to register gets the place) • Prizes for the top 5 X-Gold and colored names. • Live DJ's during the event. • Games and riddles during the evening for the spectators.
Contact Tradelaw in the Discord to register as a competitor.

<color=yellow>Update 4.19.0</color>
• Various optimization on avatar components • Cumshot system has been remade • Added Cumshot & Squirt effects to ~150 animations (~200 total) • Now Cumshot & Squirt colors can blend with eachother • Cumshot & Squirt effects now depend on Strap-On • Enabled new Cumshot & Squirt hit effect on Female Avatars (as receiver) • Interested In field in Profile Editor has been made to allow text • Friend-list will be sorted by alphabetical order
<color=yellow>Alternative Link For Update </color>

<color=yellow>Update 4.18.0 - Content </color>
• Character Editor • 14 Male Wears remade to support the new sliders • 19 Female Wears remade to support the new sliders • Visual Bug fix on 1 Female Topwear • New wears have been added • 4 Female Underwear • 2 Female Botwear • 2 Female Outfit • 1 Female Bra • 1 Female Topwear • 1 Male Topwear • 1 Male Hat
<color=yellow>Alternative Link For Update </color>
Community Moderator Application Period, You May Click On the Banner to Access to the Form

<color=yellow>Update 4.17.0</color>
• Various optimizations on player avatars • New color support for both: • Pubes • Male Beards • Some already in-use beards might look white after update, you can change this by picking a new color • Walk, Run (and Lynx) choice is saved between room changes • Fixes on ripping of the non-worn stockings • Various fixes on Clothes Control feature • Fixes on Male Tattoos and Female Face-mods missing or wrong icons

<color=yellow>Update 4.16.2</color>
• Several fixes related to high RAM usage • Color support for male eyebrows

<color=yellow>The Build Your Own Room Event has concluded</color> • We would like to introduce the winners of the competition • With our sincere gratitude and respect to all of the participants for their efforts, we've extended the prize pool
1) JLD 2) kira79 3) Adae 4) Makkye
The winners will be contacted in few days, and we invite everyone to the party that will be hosted on the winners' room this Saturday 09.03.2024

<color=yellow>Update 4.16.1</color>
• Optimization on Pose Nodes • Fixes on various bugs of the vehicles with pose interactions • Infinite loading screen on Character Editor entry has been fixed • Players are now able to control their Radio Host during slow-dancing • Ocean level not being saved properly in World Editor has been fixed • Some dances not playing properly on players upon joining a room has been fixed • Fixes on several wears on both Male and Female • A Male harness remade and moved to Top Wears

<color=yellow>Update 4.16.0</color>
• New dances have been added • 2 couple • 12 male • 10 female • Added new expressions based on new dances • Actions and Dances panels are now toggleable (minimize)
• Fixes • Male avatars invisible beard bug in character editor has been fixed • New spotlights not saving their chosen color bug has been fixed

<color=#a52a2a><size=12>Thank to you all for being a part of the Meredian Family, We've proud to inform our family grew by half since the new year, As a gratitude, we prepared a big and warm update for you ★ As well as celebrating everyone's Valentine's Day ♥️ </size></color>
<color=yellow>Update 4.15.0</color>
• World Editor • Objects • New 160 World Editor items have been added in several categories • Implemented new feature based on lights favoring extreme performance with customizable colors along with 3 new prototype objects • 3 new Pose Nodes were added • Some Pose Node collisions were remade and replaced by hand-drawn colliders for both more performance and comfort for the player • Distance and visual errors with certain existing World Editor items have been fixed • Multiple display icon replacements on existing objects • Recategorizing object structures for more efficiency for future content and bugfix deliveries • Rework on both the visible and the non visible components of the World Editor objects for more performance • Better combability adjustments have been made to objects for wide ease of use between different versions
• Materials • 140 new primitive Materials have been added • Adjustments to loading materials
• Weather • Adjustments to loading weathers
• Miscellaneous • Improvements on World loading • Negative scaling issues have been fixed (should help with colliding effects) • Loading order for World Editor assets have been adjusted • Implementation of a better categorization structure on overall the whole World Editor • Teleport object moved to Electronics Category • Respawn prop being invisible bug has been fixed
• Character Editor • A new item customization feature has been implemented • Players will be able to manually adjust print tiling, glossiness strength as well as metallic looks on their favorite items (some items might lack the support for one or more components) • This feature is an experimental feature, it may or may not be reverted back, limited or adjusted in the future • New 8 items have been added • 3 Female Topwear • 1 Female Dress • 3 Male Topwear • 1 Male Hat • Visual errors with certain existing Character Editor items have been fixed • Right Panel UI has been readjusted to comply new updates • Color support for left, right and bottom piercings as well as plugs has been fixed • Experimental items accidentally loading to the editor has been fixed
• Miscellaneous • Fixes on player Block and Unblock mechanic regarding to room hosting and joining • Fixes on the game not saving sound settings on restart • Fixes on non-recurring issues on poses icons loading

★⠀Meredian Event ★ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀We call you to create your room Theme = Freestyle | Maximum file size limit = 2MB | Deadline: 29.02.2024 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀Contact and Submit to Tradelaw or luminoushank via Discord Win colored names and X-Gold

Meredian Tomorrowland Event * Celebrate the first official event 2024 with us! * Dance, drink, have fun and win Xgold and Colored Name prizes! * Meet some of the new DJ's who will soon start monthly parties at Fresco!

<color=yellow>Update 4.14.1</color>
* World Editor * Focus button to zoom in to selected object or group has been fixed * Minimum snap (Magnet Tool) adjustable scale has been lowered from 0.1 to 0.01
* Implemented Favorite Rooms Feature * Players are now able to add a star to their favorite rooms to later filter them by preferences
* Fixes on dressed sex when players were auto undressed
* More various performance optimizations made to the game

<color=yellow>Update 4.13.0</color>
* 73 New Hairs Were added * 53 Female * 20 Male * 21 New Poses Were added * 3 F * 9 FF * 9 MF * Implemented scalable windows for both poses and chat windows * Scaling is also saved and not reset on restart

<color=yellow>Update 4.12.0</color>
83 new poses were added Extra color support is enabled for some bracelets More various fixes with the new Clothes Control feature Chat URL filtering has been readjusted The media player feature enabled in private rooms

<color=yellow>4.11.1 Changelog</color>
* Added new poses * Added missing requests reminder (toggle in settings) * Added drink effects for some bottles during Christmas week * Set price for character renaming to 20000 * Optimized the default rooms: Saloon, Beach and Island * Fixed clothes control randomly clipping or showing clothes of current player * Fixed marking poses that require strapon * Fixed several broken meshes in room editor
We would like to thank to the Official Team for them contributing new poses for our community
3DX Night Club - Meredian Party SATURDAY/ 6 PM CET/ 20-00 MSK

<color=yellow>4.10.1 Content Update</color>
- Females - 9 Topwear - 6 Botwear - 10 Outfit Items - 2 Bracelets - 2 Backpacks - 4 Footwear - 1 Headwear - 3 Bras - 1 Panties - 1 Hat - 3 Dresses - 4 Collars
- Males - 3 Topwear - 3 Botwear - 4 Outfit Items - 2 Bracelets - 2 Backpacks - 3 Footwear - 1 Headwear - 1 Harness - 1 Boxer - 1 Hat - 1 Collar
<color=yellow>The name changing now costs 20.000 Xgold, this change was to ensure more healthy and safe environment for our community by preventing the misusage of name changing</color>
Meredian Christmas Event / Saturday / 20-00 CET / 16TH DECEMBER

<color=yellow>Update 4.10.0 * Currently some trees have a visual bug in World Editor, it will not affect the actual room, fix will be in the next update.</color>
* Casino * Implemented a casino room with new slot machines * Adjusted the sound of the slot machines to players' convenience
* TV * Implemented YouTube Stream support * Added a media player volume control into the settings * Fixed the video texture clearing on playback stop * Fixed playback synchronization on room joining for .m3u8 format * Fixed various issues causing volume spike on start playing
* Misc * World Editor has been fixed * More optimization on clothes and room loading * Marked the poses that require a strapon * PictureTool, MediaPlayer and Fireworks have been moved to Electronics Category in World Editor
Dark Phoenix Club:New Opening / 10 PM-02:00 AM CET/11.12.23

<color=yellow>Having questions about supporting Meredian?</color> * It's simple! * Head over to our Discord. There, you can easily open a ticket, and our team will guide you through the donation process. Plus, you'll can unlock some great perks: *Eye-catching Colored Nicknames *Extra XGold for More Fun *Personalized Custom Names *Just click the banner to join our Discord. We're there to help you every step of the way. Thanks for being a vital part of the Meredian community! *Then you'll need to submit a ticket from #donate channel

<color=yellow>Update 4.9.0</color> * Fixes * Several clothes and their glitches and some non-displayed wears have been fixed * Fix crash on categories click in the world editor * Fix broken cuddles and wedding animations due to cross-fading
* TV Overhaul: * Add a new media player object in room editor, you can use it to play media in your room * Add YouTube links support * Remove old TV
* Add expressions preferences: speed, intensity
* Optimize clothes and room loading
* /afk message will show AFK duration now

<color=yellow>Update 4.8.0</color> * Room: * Add fireworks into room editor, you can place and use fireworks in your own room * Add commands for room owners: `/room fireworks`, `/room moderators`, for more info you can check `/help` in-game * Improve fireworks usage, you can test fireworks in your own room or room editor `/firework test` * Room owners get 50% of each fireworks purchase in their room * Implement smooth animation transitions for solo animations * Allow loading "only clothes" from character .dat presets, which will just load the saved clothes without changing the body features * Allow clicking on room owner names to open their profiles * Allow loading images from `https://imgbox.com/` because of new discord content policy for image tool for world editor * Add selected objects counter to room editor (you can select all to get total objects count) * Add unlimited and 15fps lock to graphics settings if you want to be AFK staying in the game (we may decrease resources usage in background more, let us know if you like it) * Fix the legendary bone stuck in mouth (it should have been done one day anyway) * Fix various marriage issues

Update 4.6.0 There's an ongoing friend and roomlist issue with Linux users, we are looking into it, thanks for your understanding * Animations: * Add a few poses * Add a few expressions * Add 2 more strip dances for males * Bring back pole dance actions panel * Food: * Rewrite food usage * Add a few more usable food to room editor (still in progress) * Change food prices * Room owners get 75% of any food purchase in his/her room * Other: * Optimize players scripts * Fix players collisions (clicking on players, some door colliders) * Fix using poses on vehicles

✔DARK COMPANY ♫ MEREDIAN PARTY 27 SUNDAY/ 19-00 MOSCOW TIME

<color=yellow>Update 4.2.1-content</color>
*31 new wearables and adjustment to one existing wearable *Adjustments to last world editor update *Moving of the outfits category wearables to their correct new categories

<color=yellow>Update 4.2.1</color>
*Add dance synchronization in group: set the same dance and use command in group chat `/syncdance` *Allow players to change weather in no-free-cam rooms *Improve news loading on login screen *Fix graphics bug with bloom and SSR

<color=yellow>Update 4.1.0</color>
Implement message translation To translate first enter the settings gear of chat and click Enabled, then select your language in dropdown. After click on message with ALT, your message will translated on your selected language

<color=yellow>Update 4.0.1</color>
Most important update: -New poses for 2 and 3 person -Pole dance for Man -A new building block to showcase images in various methods have been added to the World Editor. The block supports only pic from Discord. Maximum size of pic 256kb. Pic can animated, to do this select "Is Icon". Black = transparent, White = visible with the chosen color To more information visit Discord
